name: Mismatched Triad [3-in-1 bundle]
description:
{Mismatched Triad} is a set of three mini games about the masks we & others wear. They are my first Bitsy games & are experimental in nature. The soundtrack for each mini game is attached separately as I can't seem to code it in (press play on the respective embedded YT video before starting each game).

  • Mismatched I: Dissonance
    Pixel typography & a short dialogue-driven narrative
    Soundtrack:
  • Mismatched II: Two-faced
    One room, narrative driven by pixel animation & verbs
    Soundtrack:
  • Mismatched III: Persona
    First-person perspective, narrative with two different endings
    Soundtrack:

*Developer's note: This itch.io page is for the downloadable 3-in-1 bundle of Mismatched Triad. If you wish to play these games in your browser, browser-playable versions are available at

  1. https://kaelynmauve.itch.io/mismatched-dissonance
  2. https://kaelynmauve.itch.io/mismatched-two-faced
  3. https://kaelynmauve.itch.io/mismatched-persona

The explanations behind each game & walkthroughs can be found under Devlog at these urls.
